author.name: Adam Stawarek
author.bio:
Hi, I’m Adam Stawarek, a passionate software engineer.

I started this blog to share programming concepts and solutions that I find interesting and worth writing about. If you have thoughts, questions, or disagree with something I’ve written, feel free to reach out on LinkedIn or leave a comment under the article.

blog.title: Adam's crypt
blog.description: Code snippets, system design ideas, and sometimes rants about the software industry.
